attributes.action: Bullying and discrimination on Alottments and renter rights
attributes.additional_details: We would like some new laws to protect the rights of allotment renters and Allotment holders against bullying harassment victimisation persecution from committee members, councils and others
attributes.background: we want some safe Guiding, protective, and preventative rules for renters that rent Allotments and face discrimination bullying victimisation and persecution from committee members and others

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Allotments are allocated and managed by local councils. If you want to make a complaint about your allotment, you can contact your local council: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you think a crime has been committed, you should contact the police: https://www.police.uk/pu/contact-us/
